text: This alphabetically arranged list of air forces identifies the current and historical names and roundels for the military aviation arms of countries fielding an air component, whether an independent air force, a naval air arm, or army aviation unit. At the end is a separate list of no longer existent nations that once operated air forces. Country names in italics indicate that they are not generally recognized internationally as independent states but which nonetheless managed to field an active air service. For information on the size of military forces, see list of countries by size of armed forces. ==A== |rowspan="10"| |rowspan="3"| |rowspan="4"| |rowspan="3"| |rowspan="7"| |rowspan="1"| |rowspan="12"|
